T02D2532:1b-1: n'a ma sam g'i ti britti /
T02D2532:1b-3: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D2532:1b-4: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2532:1b-5: [dd] yod med rtog pa'i dra ba las //
T02D2532:1b-6: nges grol dri ma med zhi ba //
T02D2532:1b-7: phyag na ral gri bo tis mtshan //
T02D2532:1b-9: des na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2532:1b-10: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gang gi phyir
T02D2532:1b-11: bkra shis pa la sogs don mang po la 'jug
T02D2532:1b-12: mod kyi / 'on kyang de ma thag pa'i tshig tu blta'o //
T02D2532:1b-13: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2532:1b-14: dpal gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan no
T02D2532:1b-15: // rdo rje 'chang zhes bya ba ni mtshan no //
T02D2532:1b-16: dka' bas 'dul ba'i phyir gdul dka' ba ste /
T02D2532:1b-17: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2532:1b-18: de rnams 'dul bar mdzad pas na gdul dka' 'dul ba'o //
T02D2532:1b-19: de lta mod kyi gdul dka' ba ni sred med
T02D2532:1b-20: kyi bu la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yod do
T02D2532:1b-21: zhe na / de'i phyir mchog ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2532:2a-0: gang gi phyir sred med kyi bu la @2a * //
T02D2532:2a-1: sogs pa rnams kyang gdul dka' 'dul ba yin te /
T02D2532:2a-2: de lta mod kyi de rnams kyis 'dul ba ni
T02D2532:2a-3: lha ma yin 'khor la sogs pa sems can ma
T02D2532:2a-4: rungs pa rnams 'joms pas na gsod par byed par
T02D2532:2a-6: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gdug pa rnams
T02D2532:2a-7: 'dul ba ni dul bar mdzad par bzhed pas na
T02D2532:2a-8: de'i phyir 'di ni mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02D2532:2a-9: 'jig pa thams cad bral bas na dpa' bo'o //
T02D2532:2a-10: rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D2532:2a-11: par rgyal bar gyur pas na 'jig rten gsum las
T02D2532:2a-12: rgyal lo // rdo rje rigs kyi bdag por gyur pas na rdo rje dbang phyug ste /
T02D2532:2a-13: mi bskyod pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:2a-14: gsang ba'i rgyal po yin pas na gsang ba'i rgyal po ste /
T02D2532:2a-15: de yang de rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis bkug nas bka' nyan pa nyid du 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:2a-16: padma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba'i yid 'phrog pa'i spyan
T02D2532:2a-17: gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas pa'i spyan
T02D2532:2a-18: mnga' ba'o // padma yang yin la rgyas pa yang de nyid yin pas na padma rgyas pa ste /
T02D2532:2a-19: de dang 'dra ba'i zhal gang la yod pa de ni padma rgyas 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
T02D2532:2b-0: sems can 'dul ba rnams la gzigs @2b nas khro
T02D2532:2b-1: ba dang bcas par gyur pas na rang gi lag
T02D2532:2b-2: ste / de nyid kyi phyag gis rdo rje mchog
T02D2532:2b-3: yang dang yang du gsor zhing bskor bar mdzad pas
T02D2532:2b-4: na rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2532:2b-5: ste / pa gsungs so // de ltar rdo rje 'chang gi khyad par gsungs nas /
T02D2532:2b-6: khro gnyer rim par zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de'i 'khor gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2532:2b-7: khro gnyer rim par ldan zhes bya ba ni de'i
T02D2532:2b-8: rigs su gtogs pa'i lag na rdo rje la la
T02D2532:2b-9: zhig dang / de la sogs pa bgrang ba las
T02D2532:2b-10: 'das pa mtha' yas pas de rnams dang lhan cig
T02D2532:2b-11: tu phyag byas zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D2532:2b-13: dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:2b-14: rdo rje 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'jigs pa kun
T02D2532:2b-15: dang bral bas na dpa' zhing gdul dka' 'dul ba'o
T02D2532:2b-16: // 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can //
T02D2532:2b-17: zhes bya ba'i nyams dang ldan pas 'jigs su rung dang dpa' byad can te /
T02D2532:2b-19: rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba //
T02D2532:2b-20: rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa'o //
T02D2532:2b-21: sems can rnams la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po dang /
T02D2532:2b-22: shes rab dang thabs kyi bya bas sangs rgyas kyi 'phro ba byas te /
T02D2532:2b-23: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na 'gro don byed pa'o //
T02D2532:2b-24: de nyid kyis 'bras bu 'byung bas na mchog go //
T02D2532:2b-25: dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can //
T02D2532:2b-26: zhes bya ba 'dir yang 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D2532:2b-27: bsam pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sems la bya la /
T02D2532:2b-28: de bas na dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa'i sems kyis 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
T02D2532:2b-29: de la gdul dka' ba'i sems can rnams kyi mos pa mthong bas na sems dga' ba'o //
T02D2532:2b-30: ji skad du bstan pa'i chos rnams bstan pa na lan cig gis 'dzin pas na sems mgu ba'o //
T02D2532:2b-31: de'i don rtogs pas na rangs pa'o //
T02D2532:2b-32: gang gi phyir phyi rol pa'i 'gro ba'i don byed
T02D2532:2b-33: pa rnams ni sems kyi bsam pa'i dbye ba lus
T02D2532:2b-34: sems cha 'dra ba de lta bu dang 'dra ba'i
T02D2532:2b-35: sems skye bar 'gyur gyi bcom ldan 'das de'i thugs
T02D2532:2b-36: gcig pa de lta ma yin te /
T02D2532:2b-37: sems can gdug pa rnams gzigs nas khro bo'i gzugs
T02D2532:2b-38: kyi lus dang ldan par mdzad kyi rang bzhin khro
T02D2532:3a-0: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i @3a * //
T02D2532:3a-2: 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las te /
T02D2532:3a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2532:3a-4: de byed pas na sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'o //
T02D2532:3a-5: sangs rgyas phrin las byed pas ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na mgon po'o //
T02D2532:3a-6: lus btud pa ni lus btud pa dang ldan pa ste /
T02D2532:3a-7: de rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2532:3a-8: bcom ldan 'das ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2532:3a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:3a-10: ji tsam du rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pas de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2532:3a-11: dngos po thams cad las kun nas mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T02D2532:3a-12: de la rab tu dad pas phyag 'tshal nas thal mo legs par sbyar bar byas nas ni /
T02D2532:3a-13: spyan sngar mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol zhing smra bar gyur to //
T02D2532:3a-14: khyab bdag ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2532:3a-15: bdag la sman pa zhes bya ba la bdag la phan pas na bdag la sman pa ste /
T02D2532:3a-16: 'tshang rgya ba de nyid thob pa'i don du bdag
T02D2532:3a-17: la phan pa'i phyir mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
T02D2532:3a-18: bshad du gsol zhes 'og nas bshad pa'i tshig thams
T02D2532:3a-20: bdag gi don ni bdag nyid kyi don te /
T02D2532:3a-21: 'gro ba'i don bya ba de'i don du'o //
T02D2532:3a-22: bdag la thugs brtse ba ni bdag la rjes su brtse ba ste de'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:3a-23: sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i //
T02D2532:3a-24: byang chub ci nas bdag thob mdzod //
T02D2532:3a-25: ces bya ba 'dis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub la sogs pa las dga' bar ston te /
T02D2532:3a-26: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2532:3a-27: rgya'i rim pas gang mngon par byang chub pa de
T02D2532:3a-28: ci nas bdag gis thob par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2532:3a-29: de bzhin du sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir
T02D2532:3a-30: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad du gsol zhes
T02D2532:3a-31: pa'o // ji lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi phyir zhe na /
T02D2532:3a-32: nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing /
T02D2532:3a-33: mi shes 'dam du bying pa yis //
T02D2532:3a-35: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste /
T02D2532:3a-36: de rnams kyis sems dkrugs pa dang mi shes pa'i ma rig pa'o //
T02D2532:3a-37: de nyid 'dam ste der bying ba'o //
T02D2532:3a-38: de lta bu'i sems can rnams la sman pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T02D2532:3b-0: mi shes pa las bzlog pa'i @3b phyir te /
T02D2532:3b-1: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa ldog par gyur
T02D2532:3b-2: na bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur
T02D2532:3b-3: ro // de bas na de thob par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2532:3b-4: bla na med pa'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:3b-5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2532:3b-6: skal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2532:3b-7: 'gro ba rnams la dam tshig ston pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D2532:3b-8: sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rjes su ston pas na ston pa po'o //
T02D2532:3b-9: dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sa
T02D2532:3b-10: ma ya zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dus la zer
T02D2532:3b-11: te / de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-12: de yang 'di'i tshe ni sems can blo yongs su smin pa rnams la chos ston par mdzad do //
T02D2532:3b-13: 'di'i tshe na mi mdzad do zhes bya ba mkhyen te /
T02D2532:3b-14: de yang la lar bzhugs kyang mi gsungs ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:3b-15: dbang po zhes bya ba la dbang po'i sgras ni mig la sogs pa gzung ste /
T02D2532:3b-16: de yang sems can rnams kyi tha ma dang 'bring
T02D2532:3b-17: dang mchog mkhyen pas na dbang po mkhyen pa ste
T02D2532:3b-18: / de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa ni dbang po tha ma'i dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-19: theg pa chen po ni dbang po 'bring gi dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-20: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa'o ;
T02D2532:3b-21: / de yang dbang po rnon po'i dbang du gyur
T02D2532:3b-22: pas gsang sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags zhes
T02D2532:3b-23: gsungs zhes bya'o // de bzhin du bsam pa'i sgras ni sems la bya bar shes par bya ste /
T02D2532:3b-24: des kyang dbang po bzhin du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-25: gsang sngags kyi tshul ni dbang po rab kyi dbang du mdzad pa ste /
T02D2532:3b-26: des kyang dbang po bzhin du sems can rnams kyi sems mkhyen pas na mkhyen pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-27: de nyid kyis na mchog ste gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs pa'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:3b-28: bcom ldan 'dis kyi zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-29: ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku yin pas na ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D2532:3b-30: de'i gtsug tor yang yin la chen po yang yin
T02D2532:3b-31: pas na gtsug tor chen po ste de'i ngo bo
T02D2532:3b-32: nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyi gtsug tu bzhugs pa'i
T02D2532:3b-33: phyir ro // tshig gi bdag ces bya ba ni tshig gi bdag por gyur pa'o //
T02D2532:3b-34: gzugs kyi sku med pas na ye shes kyi sku'o //
T02D2532:4a-0: bstan mi dgos par bdag nyid kyi @4a * //
T02D2532:4a-1: dngos po thams cad yongs su mkhyen pas na rang byung ba'o //
T02D2532:4a-2: 'jam dpal dbyangs dang ldan pas na 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2532:4a-3: ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ye
T02D2532:4a-4: shes kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' yin pas
T02D2532:4a-5: na ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02D2532:4a-6: de'i sems dpa'i sgra ni sems yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2532:4a-7: des na ye shes sems dpa' ste /
T02D2532:4a-8: de yang kye ma'o shin tu rab tu dang ba'i //
T02D2532:4a-9: sems dpa' 'di ni yongs su dag pa zhes bshad pa'o //
T02D2532:4a-10: ye shes kyi sku dang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis
T02D2532:4a-11: kyi bye brag ni lus dang sems kyi rnam pa'i
T02D2532:4a-12: khyad par ro // ye shes sems dpa' de'i mtshan
T02D2532:4a-13: yang dag par brjod pa yang ji lta bu zhe
T02D2532:4a-14: khyad par ro // na / ming ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:4a-15: don zab ces bya ba la sogs pa la nyan
T02D2532:4a-16: thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pas na
T02D2532:4a-17: don zab pa'o // chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa ston pas na don ni rgya che ba'o //
T02D2532:4a-18: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi don dang ldan pas na don che ba'o //
T02D2532:4a-19: phyi rol gyi dpe dang bral bas na mtshungs pa med pa'o //
T02D2532:4a-20: sems can rnams kyis nges par legs pa'i lam thob par mdzad pas na rab tu zhi ba'o //
T02D2532:4a-23: bsgom pa'i gnas skabs na thog ma dang bar dang
T02D2532:4a-24: tha mar dge zhing thob par byed pas na thog
T02D2532:4a-25: ma bar dang mtha' mar dge ba'o //
T02D2532:4a-26: gzhan yang gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang /
T02D2532:4a-27: ma 'ongs pa'i rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2532:4a-28: de ltar byung ba'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
T02D2532:4a-29: kyang gdul bya'i sems can rnams tshogs pa dang ma
T02D2532:4a-30: tshogs pa la ltos nas yang dang yang du gsungs
T02D2532:4a-31: te / rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag
T02D2532:4a-32: par brjod pa ni thog ma med pa'i sems dpa'
T02D2532:4a-33: te / ste / de dang 'brel pa'i mtshan yang
T02D2532:4a-34: dag par brjod pa 'di yang thog ma med pa'i
T02D2532:4a-36: / de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2532:4a-37: rdo rjes gdul bya rnams rjes su gzung ba dang
T02D2532:4a-38: / bdag nyid yang dang yang dran par bya ba'i
T02D2532:4a-39: phyir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la zhus nas
T02D2532:4a-42: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs //
T02D2532:4b-0: zhes bya ba ji ltar @4b rung ste /
T02D2532:4b-1: ma byung ba dag gsung ba ni mi rigs so //
T02D2532:4b-2: de bas na rgyud chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:4b-3: rgyud chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'di las rdo
T02D2532:4b-4: rje 'chang chen po gsang sngags kyi lus 'dzin pa
T02D2532:4b-5: dpag tu med cing bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams
T02D2532:4b-6: kyang sems shin tu dga' bzhin pas glur blangs shing
T02D2532:4b-7: bstod pa gang lags pa de bshad cing bstan par
T02D2532:4b-8: gsol te / bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T02D2532:4b-9: rgyas kun gyi gsang ba mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2532:4b-10: pa de bzung bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang
T02D2532:4b-11: ba 'dzin par ci nas kyang bdag 'gyur ba'i phyir
T02D2532:4b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin par gyur nas bdag gis kyang nges par byung bas te /
T02D2532:4b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du mtshan yang dag
T02D2532:4b-15: par brjod pa 'di'i bdag nyid bsam pa brtan po
T02D2532:4b-16: brjed pa med pa'i sems su gyur pas gzung bar
T02D2532:4b-17: bgyi / de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang dag par bstan par bgyi ste /
T02D2532:4b-19: nyon mongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:4b-20: bdag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs ma lus par bsal zhing spang pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2532:4b-21: de bzhin du mi shes pa ste /
T02D2532:4b-22: ma rig pa spang zhing dor ba'i phyir sems can
T02D2532:4b-23: rnams kyi bsam pa tha ma dang 'bring dang mchog
T02D2532:4b-24: gi khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du shes par
T02D2532:4b-25: bgyis nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa bshad par
T02D2532:4b-26: 'tshal zhing bstan par 'tshal lo zhes pa'o //
T02D2532:4b-27: gsang dbang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2532:4b-28: ltar gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de
T02D2532:4b-29: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba byas
T02D2532:4b-30: nas thal mo spyar ba byas te /
T02D2532:4b-31: lus btud cing phab nas spyan sngar mdun du 'jug pa'o //
T02D2532:4b-32: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2532:4b-33: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsang ba'i bdag po la slar gsungs pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2532:4b-34: de yang dbang phyug la sogs pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2532:4b-35: sh'akya'i rigs su 'khrugs par ston pas na sh'akya'o //
T02D2532:4b-36: sku gsung thugs thub pas na thub pa'o //
T02D2532:4b-37: phyin ci ma log pa'i don thugs su chud pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
T02D2532:4b-38: lha dang mi'i mchog tu gyur pas na rkang gnyis mchog go //
T02D2532:4b-39: ci zhig mdzad nas slar yang gsungs she na /
T02D2532:5a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:5a-2: nyid kyi zhal nas nyid kyi ljags bsod nams kyi tshogs las byung bas na bzang ba dang /
T02D2532:5a-3: chur ring zhing rgyas par yangs pa brkyang zhing phyung nas 'dzum pa ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2532:5a-4: ji lta bu'i 'dzum pa zhe na /
T02D2532:5a-5: 'jig rten zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:5a-6: sa 'og sa stengs sa bla ni 'jig rten gsum ste /
T02D2532:5a-7: de la 'dzum pa las byung ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D2532:5a-8: de bzhin du bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2532:5a-9: bdud bzhi ni lha'i bu'i bdud la sogs pa'o //
T02D2532:5a-11: 'phags pa'i lam gyi dbang po'i srog mthar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:5a-12: de rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni rang gi yul
T02D2532:5a-13: las spos te byang chub kyi lam la sbyor ba'o
T02D2532:5a-14: // gzhan yang 'dzum pa de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2532:5a-15: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2532:5a-16: dmyal ba dang yi dags dang dud 'gror skyes pa gyur pa'i ngan song gsum sbyong bar byed pa'o //
T02D2532:5a-18: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa 'dzum pa'i 'od
T02D2532:5a-19: kyis reg pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba

T02D2532:8b-6: no // pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni 'di lta ste /

T02D2532:9a-14: de la tshad ma dang 'brel bas yul dang dus

T02D2532:9a-18: nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2532:9a-19: rab tu byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis na kun 'byung ba'o //
T02D2532:9a-20: zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis na 'gog pa'o //
T02D2532:9a-21: nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis na lam mo zhes brjod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o //
T02D2532:9a-22: stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du mtshan nyid

T02D2532:9a-26: ba'i bden pa'o // nges pa'i don la nges par 'dzin cing mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa ste /
T02D2532:9a-27: shes pa dang shes bya de ni slu bar mi 'gyur bas na nges par phye ste /
T02D2532:9a-28: rtogs pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2532:9a-29: dngos po ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa ste /

T02D2532:9a-33: pa'o // gang dang gang la nan tan du byas
T02D2532:9a-34: pas nyon mongs pa spong bar nus pa rab tu
T02D2532:9a-35: 'byung ba de ni rab tu 'byung ba'i bden pa'o
T02D2532:9a-36: pa'o // // 'dus bras thams cad ni zad par
T02D2532:9a-37: mthong ba zad pa la ni zad pa med do
T02D2532:9a-38: pa'o // // // gang zag pa med pa de ni mi skye ba ste /
T02D2532:9a-39: de ni zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i bden pa'o //
T02D2532:9a-40: ye shes kyi lam gang gis bsod nams dang ye
T02D2532:9a-41: shes bsags nas chos thams cad skye ba med pa
T02D2532:9a-42: dang 'gag pa med par shes pa la 'jug par
T02D2532:9b-0: byed pa de ni lam la 'jug pa'i shes @9b
T02D2532:9b-1: pa'i bden pa zhes brjod do //
T02D2532:9b-2: chos kyi sprin gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
T02D2532:9b-3: shes dngos po thams cad kyi yul la kun du
T02D2532:9b-4: 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yang
T02D2532:9b-5: dag par 'byung ba'i bden pa ste /
T02D2532:9b-6: bden pa bcu po de'i tshig dang don gang yin
T02D2532:9b-7: pa de ston pa'i dgos pa'i don yod pas na
T02D2532:9b-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang por gyur pas na thub dbang ngo //
T02D2532:9b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2532:9b-11: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-12: las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-13: khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-14: mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-15: dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /

T02D2532:9b-18: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-19: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-20: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs dang /
T02D2532:9b-21: zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs te /
T02D2532:9b-22: stobs de rnams dang ldan pas na stobs bcu'o //
T02D2532:9b-23: thams cad du khyab pas na khyab pa'i bdag go //
T02D2532:9b-24: mos pa sna tshogs pa'i dbye bas rab tu phye
T02D2532:9b-25: ba'i sems can ma lus pa kun gyi thar pa
T02D2532:9b-26: thob pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don skal ba ji
T02D2532:9b-27: lta ba bzhin mdzad pas na kun gyi don ni
T02D2532:9b-29: dbang rnam pa bcu ni tshe la dbang ba dang /
T02D2532:9b-31: yo byad la dbang pa dang ;
T02D2532:9b-33: skye ba la dbang ba dang /
T02D2532:9b-35: mos pa la dbang ba dang /
T02D2532:9b-36: smos lam la dbang ba dang /
T02D2532:9b-37: ye shes la dbang ba dang /
T02D2532:9b-39: dbang bcu po de rnams dang ldan pas na rnam pa bcu'i dbang ldan che ba po'o //
T02D2532:9b-40: thog ma nyid med pas na thog ma med pa ste /
T02D2532:9b-41: gal te thog ma yod par gyur na ni rgyu
T02D2532:9b-42: med par 'gyur bas na rtag tu yod pa dang
T02D2532:9b-44: phyi dang nang gi spros pas ma bsgribs pa'i bdag
T02D2532:9b-45: nyid can gang yin pa de ni spros pa med
T02D2532:10a-0: pa'i bdag go // dus thams cad du de bzhin du gnas pas na @10a * //
T02D2532:10a-2: de nyid kyis na dag pa'i bdag go //
T02D2532:10a-3: bden pa ni mi slu zhing ma log pa'i chos kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D2532:10a-4: de gsung ba'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na bden par smra ba'o //
T02D2532:10a-5: gzhan slu ba'i tshig mi gsung bas na tshig mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2532:10a-6: dam bcas pa'i don rdzogs par mdzad pas na ji skad smras pa'o //
T02D2532:10a-7: 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas su grub
T02D2532:10a-8: par gyur cig ces dam bcas pa bzhin du rdzogs
T02D2532:10a-9: par mdzad pas na de bzhin byed do //
T02D2532:10a-10: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'am shes pa dang shes par
T02D2532:10a-11: bya ba gnyis ni gzugs la sogs pa gzung bar
T02D2532:10a-12: bya ba dang mig la sogs pa 'dzin par byed
T02D2532:10a-13: pa nas ji srid du yid nas chos kyi bar
T02D2532:10a-14: ni gnyis te / gnyis po de dag med pas na gnyis su med pa ngang ngo //
T02D2532:10a-15: de ston pa ni yang dag pa'i kun rdzob tu de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2532:10a-21: chos nyid do zhes 'chad de de ltar ji srid
T02D2532:10a-22: du gnas pa rnam pa dag pa gnyis su med
T02D2532:10a-23: pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo bcom ldan 'das

T02D2532:10a-25: yang dag pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2532:10a-26: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2532:10a-27: de las gzhan ba'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2532:10a-28: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2532:10a-29: de las gzhan pa'i de kho na nyid yod pa ma yin pas yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
T02D2532:10a-30: der ni de'i bdag nyid kyis thams cad mi g-yo
T02D2532:10a-31: ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyis der gnas pas
T02D2532:10a-32: na yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D2532:10a-33: bdag dang bdag gir mngon par zhen pa la zhugs
T02D2532:10a-34: pa'i sems can rnams kyi dregs pa sel ba'i ngo
T02D2532:10a-35: bo nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2532:10a-36: bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D2532:10a-37: mu stegs ri dags ngan 'jigs byed //
T02D2532:10a-39: bdag dang bral bas na bdag med pa ste /
T02D2532:10a-40: bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na bdag med pa dang ldan la /

T02D2532:10a-42: pa gang yin pa de ni seng ge'i sgra dang
T02D2532:10a-43: ldan pa ste / chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra'o //
T02D2532:10a-44: ngan pa'i mu la brten pa gang yin pa de ni mu stegs ngan pa'o //
T02D2532:10a-45: mu stegs ngan pa ri dags dang 'dra bas na ri dgas so //
T02D2532:10b-0: de @10b rnams 'jigs par byed pas na /
T02D2532:10b-1: mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed //
T02D2532:10b-3: chad par smra ba la sogs pa dang bdag yod
T02D2532:10b-4: par khas len pa la sogs pa rnams la bdag
T02D2532:10b-5: med pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pas na skrag
T02D2532:10b-6: par mdzad ces pa'i don to //
T02D2532:10b-7: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na kun du 'gro ba ste /
T02D2532:10b-8: gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' yang med pas so //
T02D2532:10b-9: sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad
T02D2532:10b-10: du don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bgrod pa
T02D2532:10b-11: gang la yod pa de ni don yod stobs so
T02D2532:10b-12: // sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams ji ltar gshegs pa
T02D2532:10b-13: de bzhin du gshegs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o
T02D2532:10b-14: // // yid bzhin du mgyogs pas yid ltar mgyogs pa ste /
T02D2532:10b-15: yid kyi shugs kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa gtang ba'o //
T02D2532:10b-16: sdig pa'i chos rnams las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'o //
T02D2532:10b-17: smra ba rnams kyi nang na khyad par du rgyal ba mnga' bas na rnam par rgyal ba'o //
T02D2532:10b-18: phyi rol gyi bdud la sogs pa'i dgra las rnam par rgyal bas na dgra las rgyal ba'o //
T02D2532:10b-19: yi ge gcig pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba brnyes pas na 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D2532:10b-20: bdud rnams kyis zil gyis mi non pas na stobs po che'o ;
T02D2532:10b-21: / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi bslab pa'i chos ston pas na tshogs kyi slob dpon no //
T02D2532:10b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na tshogs kyi mchog go //
T02D2532:10b-23: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i lha la sogs pa'i tshogs kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur pas na tshogs rje'o //
T02D2532:10b-24: phyi rol gyi lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag por gyur pas na tshogs bdag go //
T02D2532:10b-25: bdag por gyur pa'i dbang thob pas na dbang dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2532:10b-26: sems can thams cad kyi steng du mthu chen po mnga' bas na mthu chen no //
T02D2532:10b-27: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D2532:10b-28: gces pa dang ldan pas na gces par 'dzin pa'o
T02D2532:10b-29: // theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi bdag nyid can yin pas na tshul chen no //
T02D2532:10b-30: gzhan rnams kyis bkri mi dgos pas na gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa ste /
T02D2532:10b-31: gzhan gyis ma bcol bar rang nyid kyis sems can gyi don mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:11a-0: don so so yang dag par rig @11a * //
T02D2532:11a-1: pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig gi dbang phyug tu gyur pas na tshig rje'o //
T02D2532:11a-2: chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyi
T02D2532:11a-3: rjes su rab tu 'jug pas chos ston par mdzad
T02D2532:11a-5: lha dang gnod sbyin dang dri za la sogs pa'i
T02D2532:11a-6: tshig gi lam ji snyed pa'i nges pa'i tshig dang
T02D2532:11a-7: tha snyad de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen pas
T02D2532:11a-9: de dang de'i nges pa'i tshig gis de rnams la dam pa'i chos ston pas na smra mkhas pa'o //
T02D2532:11a-10: bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning la sogs
T02D2532:11a-11: pa'i dbye bas chos rnams rab tu ston pas na
T02D2532:11a-14: cal col ma yin pa dang /
T02D2532:11a-16: rnam par dag pa'i tshig gi dbye bas 'dul ba'i
T02D2532:11a-17: thabs dpag tu med pa'i gsung gang la yod pa
T02D2532:11a-18: de ni tshig mtha' yas pa ste /
T02D2532:11a-19: de dag gis ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D2532:11a-20: mi slu ba'i tshig dang ldan pas na tshig bden no //
T02D2532:11a-21: bden pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings so //
T02D2532:11a-22: bden par smra ba'i ngang tshul mda' bas na bden par smra ba'o //
T02D2532:11a-28: bden pa bzhi po de dag ston pas na bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po'o //
T02D2532:11a-29: sa brgyad pa la bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pas phyir mi ldog pa'o //
T02D2532:11a-30: 'khor bar mi 'ong bas na phyir mi 'ong ba'o //
T02D2532:11a-31: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi gtso bor gyur pas na 'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul lo //
T02D2532:11a-32: 'dis sems can rnams nges par 'byung bas na nges par 'byung ba ste lam mo //
T02D2532:11a-33: des na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi lam
T02D2532:11a-34: dang 'bras bu'i tshul gyis der bdag nyid lam dang
T02D2532:11a-35: 'bras bu'i tshul gyis gzugs su rab tu ston pas
T02D2532:11a-36: na nges 'byung sna tshogs las byung ba'o //
T02D2532:11a-37: 'byung ba chen po ni rdzu 'phrul can no //
T02D2532:11a-38: de sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i rgyu gcig pu ni
T02D2532:11a-39: bcom ldan 'das nyid yin pas na 'byung ba chen
T02D2532:11a-41: nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dge slong ngo //
T02D2532:11a-42: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas na dgra bcom mo //
T02D2532:11a-43: nang gi nyon mongs pa'i gang zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de ni zag pa zad pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-1: gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags gang gis spangs shing bor ba de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o //
T02D2532:11b-2: dbang po thul bas yul la 'jug pa las zlog pa gang yin pa de dbang po thul ba'o //
T02D2532:11b-3: nye bar dmigs pa'i nye bar len pa'i nyon mongs
T02D2532:11b-4: pa'i gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas na
T02D2532:11b-6: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob pas na 'jigs med thob ba'o //
T02D2532:11b-7: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba sel bas na bsil bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-8: rnyog pa ni dri ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-9: dri ma med pas na rnyog pa med de nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2532:11b-10: des na gang gi phyir rnyog pa thams cad dang bral ba de'i phyir rnyog pa med pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-11: mi slob pa'i rig pa gsum dang /
T02D2532:11b-12: mi slob pa'i lus dang ngag sdom pa'i 'tsho ba
T02D2532:11b-13: la sogs pa'i rkang pa dang ldan pas na rig
T02D2532:11b-14: pa dang ni rkang par ldan no //
T02D2532:11b-15: phyir mi ldog par gshegs pas na bde bar gshegs pa ste /
T02D2532:11b-16: rims nang las legs par byang ba bzhin no //
T02D2532:11b-19: rigs kyi dbye bas phye ba'i sems can gyi 'jig
T02D2532:11b-20: rten ji lta ba bzhin mkhyen pas na 'jig rten
T02D2532:11b-21: rig pa'o // thams cad kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
T02D2532:11b-22: 'di ni bdag gi'o zhes bdag gi ba med pas na bdag gir mi 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-23: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyi bdag gi ngo bo med pas na ngar mi 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-24: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis po de nyid tshul te gzhung lugs so //
T02D2532:11b-25: der gnas par mdzad pas na bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-30: lha'i srid par yang dang yang du 'khor bas 'khor ba'o //
T02D2532:11b-31: de'i pha rol tu son pas na 'khor ba'i pha rol tu son pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-32: de'i mtha' ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2532:11b-33: der gnas pas na 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar son pa'o //
T02D2532:11b-35: 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid yongs su skye ba med
T02D2532:11b-36: par mkhyen la de med na mya ngan las 'das
T02D2532:11b-37: pa yang med pas mi gnas pa la bzhugs zhes

T02D2532:15a-28: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'bebs pas na 'bebs pa che'o //
T02D2532:15a-29: dngos po'i chos ji lta ba bzhin gnas pa'i don
T02D2532:15a-30: gzigs pa'i spyan brgya snyed kyis gnas pa gang yin
T02D2532:15a-31: pa de ni mig brgya pa'o //
T02D2532:15a-32: de rnams kyang rdo rje 'bar ba dang ldan pas na rdo rje'i mig go //
T02D2532:15a-33: rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi ba spu ni shin tu
T02D2532:15a-34: rno ba myu gu lta bu gang la yod pa
T02D2532:15a-35: ste // des na 'di ni lus rdo rje'i ba spu can no //
T02D2532:15a-36: tha mal ba'i ba spu mi mnga' bas na rdo
T02D2532:15a-37: rje'i spu gnyis su med pa'i lus gang yin pa
T02D2532:15a-38: de ni rdo rje'i spu ni gcig pu lus so
T02D2532:15a-39: // shin tu brtan zhing sra ba'i lus rdo rje'i
T02D2532:15a-40: rtse mo rnams las bsgrubs shing skyes pa'i sen mo
T02D2532:15a-41: gang la yod pa de ni sen mo skyes pa
T02D2532:15a-42: // rdo rje'i rtse'o // rdo rje ltar snying po
T02D2532:15a-43: mkhregs shing sra ba'i pags pa gang la yod pa
T02D2532:15b-0: de ni rdo rje @15b snying po pags pa mkhregs
T02D2532:15b-1: // rdo rje'i rtse'o // so // rdo rje'i phreng ba bsnams pas rdo rje phreng thogs so //
T02D2532:15b-2: ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na dpal ldan no //
T02D2532:15b-3: rdo rjes mtshon pa'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa yin pas na rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2532:15b-4: gang rgyangs zhes pa'i bzhad pa sgrogs par mdzad pas na gang rgyangs h'a h'a'o //
T02D2532:15b-5: chos nyid nges par sgrogs pas na nges par sgrogs so //
T02D2532:15b-6: yi ge drug pa'i gsang sngags kyi bdag nyid can yin pas yi ge drug pa'o //
T02D2532:15b-7: rdo rje theg pa'i sgra yin pas na rdo rje sgra'o //
T02D2532:15b-8: 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i gsung gang la yod pa de ni 'jam dbyangs so ;
T02D2532:15b-9: / bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra che ba'o //
T02D2532:15b-10: 'jig rten gsum na sgra gcig gis gnyis su med
T02D2532:15b-11: pa chen po nyid ston pa'i sgra sgrogs pas 'jig
T02D2532:15b-12: rten gsum na sgra gcig pa'o //
T02D2532:15b-13: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par sgra sgrogs pa
T02D2532:15b-14: dang ldan pas na nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs
T02D2532:15b-15: pa'o // sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi nang na
T02D2532:15b-16: dam pa yin pas na sgra dang ldan pa rnams
T02D2532:15b-21: yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs kyis de kho na nyid ston pas na /
T02D2532:15b-22: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid /
T02D2532:15b-23: yang dag mtha' ste zhes bya'o //
T02D2532:15b-24: yi ge thams cad kyi brjod du med pas na yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2532:15b-25: stong pa nyid gsungs pa'i ngang tshul mnga' bas na stong nyid smra ba'o //
T02D2532:15b-26: smra ba po thams cad kyi nang na gtso bor gyur pas na smra ba'i khyu mchog go //
T02D2532:15b-27: stong pa nyid rab tu ston pa'i zab cing rgya
T02D2532:15b-28: che ba sgrogs pa gang yin pa de ni zab
T02D2532:15b-29: cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D2532:15b-30: chos kyi dung 'bud pas na chos kyi dung ngo //
T02D2532:15b-31: bsod nams chen po'i sgra sgrogs pas na sgra chen no //
T02D2532:15b-32: chos kyi gand'is bdud kyi yul rnam par skrag par mdzad pas na chos kyi gand'i sgra bo che'o //
T02D2532:15b-33: gnas pa ni ston pa ste /
T02D2532:15b-34: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi
T02D2532:15b-35: gnas pas na mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa po'o
T02D2532:15b-36: // phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che brdung bas na chos kyi rnga bo che'o //
T02D2532:15b-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid pas na gzugs med pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-0: mtshan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sku'i @16a * //
T02D2532:16a-1: bdag nyid can pas na gzugs bzang dam pa ste'o //
T02D2532:16a-2: sprul pa'i skus gdul bya sna tshogs pa dang rjes
T02D2532:16a-3: su mthun pas yang dag par bstan pas na sna
T02D2532:16a-5: phyi rol gyi don gyis stong zhing yid tsam pa nyid pas na yid las skyes pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-6: gzugs can thams cad snang ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan
T02D2532:16a-7: pas na gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal lo
T02D2532:16a-8: // 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa gdul bar
T02D2532:16a-9: bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
T02D2532:16a-10: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs su gcig
T02D2532:16a-11: par ston pa'i gzugs brnyan 'chang bas gzugs brnyan ma
T02D2532:16a-13: thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i nus pas mi
T02D2532:16a-14: g-yo ba dang ldan pas na tshugs pa med cing
T02D2532:16a-15: ngo // khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag por gyur pas na cher grags pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-16: khams gsum du ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang ldan pas na khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste'o //
T02D2532:16a-17: 'phags pa'i lam mtho zhing 'phags pa la zhugs pas na 'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-18: gang zhe na dar ba chen po chos kyi tog ste /
T02D2532:16a-19: dar ba chen po'i rgyur gyur pas na dar ba chen po'o //
T02D2532:16a-20: chos kyi tog ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2532:16a-21: 'jig rten gsum po dag na gzhon nu'i lus kyi
T02D2532:16a-22: sku 'chang ba gcig pu nyid gang yin pa de
T02D2532:16a-23: ni 'jig rten gsum na gzhon lus gcig pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-24: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du
T02D2532:16a-25: gyur pas na thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas
T02D2532:16a-27: thams cad mkhyen pas bgres pas na rgan po'o //
T02D2532:16a-28: skye dgu ma lus ba skyong bas na skye dgu'i bdag po'o //
T02D2532:16a-29: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa la
T02D2532:16a-30: sogs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
T02D2532:16a-31: gnyis mnga' bas na sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang
T02D2532:16a-32: ba'o // 'od dang ldan pas na sdu gu'o //
T02D2532:16a-33: yan lag gi cha shas legs par rdzogs pas na 'jig rten gsum na mdzes pa'o //
T02D2532:16a-35: yon tan gyi pha rol tu son pas na 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te'o //
T02D2532:16a-36: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad rnams la shin tu mkhas pas na 'jig rten slob dpon no //
T02D2532:16b-0: rgol ba thams cad zil gyis gnon pas na @16b 'jigs pa med pa ste mkhas pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-1: 'gro dang ldog pa thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pas na mgon po'o //
T02D2532:16b-2: sems can ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa rnams las skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-3: 'jig rten gsum la slu ba med pas na 'jig rten yid gcugs pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-4: nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pas skrag
T02D2532:16b-5: pa rnams kyi skyabs su gyur pas na skyabs dang
T02D2532:16b-6: ngo // sems can thams cad kyi rgyud skyob pas na skyob pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-7: 'di'i gong na med pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-8: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar longs spyod kyis khyab pa'i
T02D2532:16b-9: chos dang zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2532:16b-10: can gyis yang dag pa'i longs spyod la spyod pas
T02D2532:16b-11: na nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod pa'o //
T02D2532:16b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rin po che
T02D2532:16b-13: dang 'dra bas na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2532:16b-14: mtsho'o // ma rig pa'i sgo nga nyid ni de
T02D2532:16b-15: kho na nyid rab tu 'gebs pas na sbubs so
T02D2532:16b-16: mtsho'o // // de yang dag par 'byed cing rnam
T02D2532:16b-17: par 'joms pas nam rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed ba'o
T02D2532:16b-18: mtsho'o // // // srid pa nyid dra ba yin la /
T02D2532:16b-19: shes rab kyi ral gris rnam par 'joms pas na srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po'o //
T02D2532:16b-20: nyon mongs ma lus pa dang bral ba gang yin
T02D2532:16b-21: pa de ni nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa'o
T02D2532:16b-22: // gang gi phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa thams
T02D2532:16b-23: cad dang bral ba de nyid kyis na 'khor ba'i
T02D2532:16b-24: rgya mtsho pha rol phyin pa nyid de /
T02D2532:16b-25: nyes pa dang bral bas 'khor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2532:16b-26: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba'i
T02D2532:16b-27: cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba mnga' bas na ye
T02D2532:16b-28: shes dbang bskur cod pan can no //
T02D2532:16b-29: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs
T02D2532:16b-30: pa ni bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal lo
T02D2532:16b-31: // sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2532:16b-33: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gsum ste /
T02D2532:16b-34: de lta bu'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gsum
T02D2532:16b-35: zhi bar mdzad pas na sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug
T02D2532:16b-36: bsngal zhi ba'o // bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gsum mthar phyin par mdzad pas na gsum sel lo //
T02D2532:16b-37: sems can dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad pas na mtha' yas so //
T02D2532:16b-38: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par
T02D2532:16b-39: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mi phyed pa'i rnam par
T02D2532:17a-0: @17a * // // nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D2532:17a-1: shes bya'i sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang
T02D2532:17a-2: bral bas na sgrib pa gsum las nges par grol
T02D2532:17a-3: ba'o // sgrib ba rnam par dag pas nam mkha'
T02D2532:17a-4: ltar mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2532:17a-5: la gnas pas na nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid
T02D2532:17a-6: ba'o // la gnas pa'o // nyon mongs pa'i dri
T02D2532:17a-7: ma thams cad las 'das pas na nyon mongs dri
T02D2532:17a-10: da ltar byung ba ste dus gsum las 'das pas na dus gsum dus med rtogs pa po'o //
T02D2532:17a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i char gyis sems can
T02D2532:17a-12: gyi rgyud tshim par mdzad pa'i phyir sems can kun
T02D2532:17a-14: yon tan nyid thod dam rtse mo yin la /
T02D2532:17a-15: yon tan gyi thod de thod du byas pas na
T02D2532:17a-16: yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod de mchog tu
T02D2532:17a-17: gyur ba'o // glo bur pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
T02D2532:17a-18: las nges par grol bas na nyon mongs kun las
T02D2532:17a-20: de nyid kyis na nam mkha'i lam ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis te /
T02D2532:17a-21: de'i bdag nyid kyis mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2532:17a-22: du rab tu gnas pas na nam mkha'i lam la
T02D2532:17a-23: rab gnas pa'o // yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
T02D2532:17a-24: po che'i gzugs 'dzin pas ni yid bzhin nor bu
T02D2532:17a-26: khyab pas na khyab bdag go //
T02D2532:17a-27: sems can thams cad kyi ji ltar 'dod pa'i don
T02D2532:17a-28: yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa nyid kyis na rin
T02D2532:17a-30: sems can thams cad mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po
T02D2532:17a-31: rdzogs par mdzad pas na dpag bsam shing chen no
T02D2532:17a-32: // thams cad du khyab pa'i grib ma dang ldan pas na rgyas pa ste'o //
T02D2532:17a-33: sems can thams cad la bde ba stsol pa ni bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog go //
T02D2532:17a-34: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can thams
T02D2532:17a-35: cad kyi don mdzad pas na byed pa sems can
T02D2532:17a-37: rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la phan pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na phan 'dogs mdzad do //
T02D2532:17a-38: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa gces pa
T02D2532:17a-39: ltar mnyes gshin pas na sems can mnyes gshin pa'o
T02D2532:17a-40: // dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu mtho
T02D2532:17b-0: @17b ris dang dmyal ba yongs su mkhyen pas na
T02D2532:17b-2: bya ba dang dus kyi rnam par 'byed pa mngon du yongs su mkhyen pas na dus shes pa'o //
T02D2532:17b-3: thams cad du khyab pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid bas na khyab bdag go //
T02D2532:17b-4: kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su mkhyen pas na dam tshig shes pa'o //
T02D2532:17b-5: grub pa'i mtha' thams cad kyi dngos grub dang dam
T02D2532:17b-6: tshig yongs su mkhyen pa mnga' bas na dam tshig
T02D2532:17b-7: ldan no // sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i
T02D2532:17b-8: dus las mi 'da' bar 'dul bar mdzad pas na
T02D2532:17b-9: ldan no // dus shes pa'o // sems can rnams
T02D2532:17b-10: kyi dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po mkhyen pas
T02D2532:17b-11: na sems can dbang don shes so //
T02D2532:17b-12: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2532:17b-13: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba nyon mongs
T02D2532:17b-14: pa dang rnam par bral ba'i bdag nyid can yongs
T02D2532:17b-15: su mkhyen pas na rnam pa gsum la mkhas pa
T02D2532:17b-16: po'o // stobs dang mi 'jigs pa ni yon tan te ;
T02D2532:17b-17: de rnams 'di la mnga' bas na yon tan ldan no //
T02D2532:17b-18: gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i yon tan rnams kyang mkhyen pas na yon tan shes pa'o //
T02D2532:17b-19: chos rnams sgyu ma dang 'dra ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2532:17b-20: tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na
T02D2532:17b-21: chos shes pa'o // bsod nams kyi rang bzhin yin pas na bkra shis so //
T02D2532:17b-22: bkra shis thams cad kyang 'di las byung bas na bkra shis 'byung ngo //
T02D2532:17b-23: bkra shis thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa'o //
T02D2532:17b-24: grags pa'i rgyur gyur pas na'am bsod nams kyi ngo
T02D2532:17b-25: bo nyid kyis kun gyis bsgrags pas na grags pa'o
T02D2532:17b-26: // dpal gyi gnas su gyur pas na bkra shis pa'o //
T02D2532:17b-27: yon tan thams cad dri ma med pa'i snyan pa grags pas na snyan grags so //
T02D2532:17b-28: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis dge ba'i ngo bo nyid pas na dge ba'o //
T02D2532:17b-29: thams cad kyi dbugs 'byin pa'i gnas su gyur pas na dbugs 'byin chen po'o //
T02D2532:17b-30: sbyin pa la sogs pa yang dag par ston pa'i
T02D2532:17b-31: dga' ston chen po mnga' bas na dga' ston chen
T02D2532:17b-32: po'o // sems can rnams kyi dga' ba'i mchog tu gyur pas na dga' chen no //
T02D2532:17b-33: 'tshang rgya ba dang che bas thob pa'i rol mo gang yin pa de ni rol mo che'o //
T02D2532:17b-34: mchod pa la sogs pa'i bkur sti thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni bkur sti'o //
T02D2532:18a-0: @18a * // mdzes par byed pa'i bya bas sems can rnams kyi
T02D2532:18a-1: don rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2532:18a-2: rim gro'o // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T02D2532:18a-3: kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pas na phun sum tshogs
T02D2532:18a-4: rim gro'o // pa'o // rtag tu bde ba dang
T02D2532:18a-5: yid bde ba'i bdag nyid can yin pas na mchog
T02D2532:18a-6: rim gro'o // pa'o // tu dga' ba'o // rnam
T02D2532:18a-7: pa thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i yon tan
T02D2532:18a-8: gyi grags pa'i bdag por gyur pas na grags bdag
T02D2532:18a-9: rim gro'o // pa'o // tu dga' ba'o // go
T02D2532:18a-10: // chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal dang ldan pas na
T02D2532:18a-11: rim gro'o // pa'o // tu dga' ba'o // go
T02D2532:18a-12: // dpal lo // sangs rgyas nyid kyi mchog dang
T02D2532:18a-13: ldan pas na mchog ldan no //
T02D2532:18a-14: mchog stsol bar 'os pas na mchog sbyin no ;
T02D2532:18a-15: / thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pas na gtso bo'o //
T02D2532:18a-16: skyabs rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na skyabs kyi dam pa'o //
T02D2532:18a-17: 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i skyabs su 'os pas na skyabs su 'os pa'o //
T02D2532:18a-18: seng ge la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra'i gzugs can du gyur pas na 'jigs chen dgra'o //
T02D2532:18a-19: bdag med pa gnyis thugs su chud pas na rab kyi mchog go //
T02D2532:18a-20: 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa ma lus par sel bar mdzad pas na 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'o //
T02D2532:18a-21: gtsug phud tsam 'jog pas na gtsug phud do //
T02D2532:18a-22: rma bya la bcibs pas na gtsug phud can no //
T02D2532:18a-23: lcang lo 'dzin pas na lcang lo can no //
T02D2532:18a-24: ral ba bsgyings pa dang ldan pas na ral ba can no //
T02D2532:18a-25: gdul bar bya ba'i phyir rab tu byung ba'i rtags 'dzin pas na munydza'o //
T02D2532:18a-26: nor bu thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i cod pan 'chang bas na cod pan thogs pa'o //
T02D2532:18a-27: zhal lnga dang ldan pas na gdong lnga'o //
T02D2532:18a-28: gzhon nu'i gzugs kyi gtsug bud mnga' bas na gtsug bud lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2532:18a-29: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi thod
T02D2532:18a-30: dang ldan pa'i cod pan mnga' ba gang yin pa
T02D2532:18a-31: de ni zur phud lnga pa me tog thod do
T02D2532:18a-32: // mgo bregs shing ska rags 'chang bas na mgo zlum mo //
T02D2532:18a-33: brtul zhugs chen po'i sngags spyod pa 'dzin pas na brtul zhugs chen po'o //
T02D2532:18a-34: ye shes kyi tshangs pa dang spyod pas na tshangs par spyod pa'o //
T02D2532:18a-35: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi brtul zhugs mchog go //
T02D2532:18a-36: dka' thub kyi mthar phyin pa brnyes pas na dka' thub mthar phyin no //
T02D2532:18a-37: sku gsung thugs chen po bsgom pa'i dka' thub dang ldan pas na dka' thub chen po'o //
T02D2532:18b-0: dkyil @18b 'khor chen po'i dbang bskur bas bkrus pas na gtsang gnas so //
T02D2532:18b-1: thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pas na dam pa'o //
T02D2532:18b-2: goo ta ma la sogs pa'i drang srong rnams 'dul bas na goo ta ma'o //
T02D2532:18b-3: srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bas na bram ze'o //
T02D2532:18b-4: chos kyi dbyings kyi tshangs pa mkhyen pas na tshangs pa'o //
T02D2532:18b-5: gnyis su med pa'i tshangs pa shes pa'o //

T02D2532:24b-41: du mi phyed pas na sangs rgyas kun gyi rang
T02D2532:24b-42: sangs rgyas so // bzhin 'chang ngo // chos kyi
T02D2532:24b-43: sku dang ldan pas na 'byung ba las gyur pa'i
T02D2532:24b-44: sangs rgyas so // bzhin 'chang ngo // lus med
T02D2532:24b-45: pa'o // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku kun dang ldan
T02D2532:24b-47: sprul pa'i sku dang ldan pas na lus kyi mchog go //
T02D2532:24b-48: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa dang ldan pas na lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa'o //
T02D2532:24b-49: lus kyi mtha' rtogs pa'i tshul gyis na gzugs rnams thams cad kun du ston pa'o //
T02D2532:24b-50: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i
T02D2532:24b-51: yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ngo bor gyur pas na
T02D2532:25a-0: @25a * // rin po ches mtshan pa'i rgyal mtshan ni rin chen tog go //
T02D2532:25a-1: chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2532:25a-2: pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par bya ba
T02D2532:25a-3: yin pas na sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba'o
T02D2532:25a-4: // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D2532:25a-5: byang chub de'i rang bzhin yin pas na sangs rgyas
T02D2532:25a-6: // byang chub bo // 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas na bla na med pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-7: gsang sngags kyi rgyud las byung bas na gsang sngags las byung ba'o //
T02D2532:25a-8: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pas na yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-11: rdo rje'i rigs ni gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum yin te /
T02D2532:25a-12: de'i rang bzhin yin pas na gsang sngags chen po'i rigs gsum pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-13: gsang sngags thams cad kyi bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pas na gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa po'o //
T02D2532:25a-14: rig pa'i ngang tshul can ni thig le chen po ste /
T02D2532:25a-15: sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:25a-16: yi ge dang sgra skad dang brda thams cad dang bral bas yi ge med pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-17: stong pa nyid chen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na stong pa chen po'o //
T02D2532:25a-18: aa ra pa tsa na ste yi ge lnga'i bdag nyid can yin pas na yi ge lnga'o //
T02D2532:25a-19: thig le stong pa nyid kyi gsang sngags dam pa'i
T02D2532:25a-20: yi ge brgya yin pas na thig le stong pa
T02D2532:25a-21: yi ge brgya'o // sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pas na rnam pa kun ldan no //
T02D2532:25a-22: chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid yin pas na rnam pa med pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-23: bcu drug phyed phyed bzhi cha'i lhag mar gyur pa'i
T02D2532:25a-24: zla ba'i thig le ral pa'i cod pan la thogs
T02D2532:25a-25: pas na bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can no
T02D2532:25a-26: // yan lag med pa gang yin pa de ni
T02D2532:25a-27: yan lag med pa ste cha shas med pa zhes
T02D2532:25a-29: brtsi ba dang grangs kyis bcad pa las 'das pas na /
T02D2532:25a-31: bsam gtan gsum pa'i rtse mo rnam par mi rtog
T02D2532:25a-32: pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa 'dzin pas na bsam gtan
T02D2532:25a-33: bzhi pa'i rtse mo can no //
T02D2532:25a-34: de nyid mkhyen pas na bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing ngo //
T02D2532:25a-35: ting nge 'dzin ni dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-36: de'i rigs dang rgyud ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-37: de mkhyen pas na ting nge 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa'o //
T02D2532:25a-38: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2532:25b-0: de nyid sku gnyis pas mchog tu gyur pas na @25b lus kyi mchog go //
T02D2532:25b-1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku thams cad du mdzes pas na longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal lo //
T02D2532:25b-2: gang gi phyir mchog tu gyur cing sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2532:25b-3: sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba de nyid kyis na sprul
T02D2532:25b-4: pa'i sku ste sku'i mchog / sangs rgyas pa'i sprul
T02D2532:25b-6: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2532:25b-7: ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
T02D2532:25b-9: phyogs bcur rnam pa sna tshogs shing du ma'i sprul
T02D2532:25b-10: pa 'gyed pa la brten nas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2532:25b-11: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa gang yin pa de la
T02D2532:25b-13: la lar ni lha'i dbang por ston pa'o //
T02D2532:25b-15: lha'i bdag po ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i bdag po'o //
T02D2532:25b-16: lha min bdag po ni thags bzangs ris la sogs pa'o //
T02D2532:25b-17: la lar ni 'chi med dbang po ste /
T02D2532:25b-18: 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal po'o //
T02D2532:25b-19: lha'i bla ni gza' phur bu'o //
T02D2532:25b-20: 'jigs byed ni drag po'i tshogs so //
T02D2532:25b-21: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni drag po'o //
T02D2532:25b-22: de dag la sogs pa'i sprul pa rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:25b-23: 'khor ba'i bag chags kyi nyes pa med pas na srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba'o //
T02D2532:25b-24: 'gro ba la rjes su ston pas na ston pa'o //
T02D2532:25b-25: gnyis pa med pas na gcig pu'o //
T02D2532:25b-26: 'gro ba'i bla mar gyur pas na 'gro ba'i bla ma'o //
T02D2532:25b-27: chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su shas cher grags pas na /
T02D2532:25b-28: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
T02D2532:25b-29: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po'o //
T02D2532:25b-30: ci zhig mdzad nas bdud 'joms she na //
T02D2532:25b-31: byams pa'i go chas sku la gyon pas chas byas
T02D2532:25b-32: shing de bzhin nyid du snying rje'i ya lad bgo
T02D2532:25b-33: ba byas nas shes rab kyi ral gri mda' gzhu
T02D2532:25b-34: thogs te g-yul las rgyal bar mdzad do zhes sbyar
T02D2532:25b-35: ro // nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i g-yul
T02D2532:25b-36: do las rgyal bar mdzad pas na nyon mongs mi
T02D2532:25b-38: 'jigs pa med pas na dpa' bo'o //
T02D2532:25b-39: bdud kyi dgra yin pas na bdud dgra'o //
T02D2532:25b-40: bdud las rgyal bas na bdud thul ba'o //
T02D2532:25b-44: lha'i bu'i bdud ces grags pa ni bdud bzhi'o //
T02D2532:25b-45: de rnams kyi 'jigs pa rnams sel cing mthar thug par mdzad pas na /
T02D2532:25b-46: bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed /
T02D2532:26a-2: bcom ldan 'das ni bdud kyi dpung gi bar rnams
T02D2532:26a-3: kyang pham par mdzad pas na bdud kyi dpung rnams
T02D2532:26a-4: pham byed pa'o // de nyid kyis na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi 'dren par gyur pa'o //
T02D2532:26a-5: mchog tu bla mar gyur pa yin pas na phyag byar 'os pa yin la ;
T02D2532:26a-8: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2532:26a-9: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2532:26a-11: khams gsum thams cad du gom pa gcig gis bgrod
T02D2532:26a-12: par mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten
T02D2532:26a-13: gsum po gom gcig bgrod pa'o //
T02D2532:26a-14: de ltar mkha' ltar mtha' yas te de'i mthar thug
T02D2532:26a-15: pa'i gom pa mnga' bas na mkha' ltar mtha' med
T02D2532:26a-16: pa rnam par gnon zhes bya'o //
T02D2532:26a-17: byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2532:26a-19: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-21: rig pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni ye shes la
T02D2532:26a-22: zer bas des na ye shes rnam pa gsum dang
T02D2532:26a-24: bdag dang bdag gir yongs su shes pa'i bag chags
T02D2532:26a-25: thams cad dang bral bas na gtsang ba'i phyir gtsang
T02D2532:26a-26: ma'o // nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02D2532:26a-27: lha'i mig la sogs pa mngon par shes pa drug
T02D2532:26a-28: gang la yod pa de ni mngon shes drug ldan
T02D2532:26a-29: no // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-30: chos rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-31: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-32: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-33: gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
T02D2532:26a-34: lha rjes su dran pa rnams te /
T02D2532:26a-35: de rnams dang ldan pas na rjes dran drug go //
T02D2532:26a-36: byang chub la sems pa'i sems gang la yod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2532:26a-37: gzhan gyi don la gcig tu mdzad pas na sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2532:26a-38: rnam pa thams cad kyi yul la dad pa'i rdzu 'phrul ldan pas na rdzu 'phrul chen po'o //
T02D2532:26a-39: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas na 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2532:26a-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2532:26a-41: chos kyi sku thugs su chud pa'i mthar thug pas
T02D2532:26a-42: na shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'o //
T02D2532:26a-43: rnam pa thams cad du de'i ngo bo nyid du
T02D2532:26a-44: gyur pas na shes rab kyis ni de nyid thob
T02D2532:26a-45: pa'o // so so rang rig pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis bdag rig pas na bdag rig go //
T02D2532:26b-0: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i @26b tshul gyis gzhan rig pas gzhan rig go //
T02D2532:26b-1: bya ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pas na thams cad pa'o //
T02D2532:26b-2: sems cad thams cad la phan par dgongs pas na kun la phan pa'o //
T02D2532:26b-3: mang pos bkur bas gang zag gi gtso bor gyur pas na gang zag mchog go //
T02D2532:26b-4: thams cad dpe thams cad las 'das pas na dper bya kun las 'das pa ste'o //
T02D2532:26b-5: nges par legs par 'dod pa rnams la mtho ris
T02D2532:26b-6: dang thar pa'i rgyur gyur pas na de nyid shes
T02D2532:26b-8: shes par bya ba de las gzhan med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2532:26b-9: de kho na nyid kyi ye shes ma lus pa
T02D2532:26b-10: skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa shes pa thams cad mkhyen
T02D2532:26b-12: dam pa yin pas na mchog go //
T02D2532:26b-13: sbyin pa thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin la /
T02D2532:26b-14: de bas na chos kyi sbyin bdag gi gtso bor gyur pas gtso bor chos kyi sbyin bdag ste'o //
T02D2532:26b-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bzhi'o //
T02D2532:26b-19: de rnams kyi don ni phyag rgya bzhi'i don te /
T02D2532:26b-20: de la phyag rgya chen po ni lha'i sku ste /
T02D2532:26b-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2532:26b-23: chos kyi phyag rgya ni ngag tu brjod pa'o //
T02D2532:26b-24: las kyi phyag rgya ni bya ba grub pa'i sku'o //
T02D2532:26b-25: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gyi gnas kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang /
T02D2532:26b-26: nyan thos la sogs pa nges par 'byung ba gsum
T02D2532:26b-27: gyis bgrod par bzhud pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam
T02D2532:26b-28: dpal lo // de bas na don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal te gzhan ma yin no //
T02D2532:26b-30: don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal //
T02D2532:26b-31: zhes bya ba las shes so //
T02D2532:26b-33: 'jig rten gsum na skal ba bzang po nyid kyis
T02D2532:26b-34: mngon par 'dod pa'i don thams cad rdzogs par mdzad
T02D2532:26b-35: cing dpal dang ldan pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
T02D2532:26b-36: gyur pas na / 'jig rten gsum na skal bzang che //
T02D2532:26b-37: dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa /
T02D2532:26b-38: 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog go //
T02D2532:26b-39: de nas da ni phyag 'tshal gsungs pa yin te //
T02D2532:26b-40: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2532:26b-41: ces bya ba la mchog ni sangs rgyas nyid do //
T02D2532:26b-42: de stsol bas na mchog sbyin no //
T02D2532:26b-43: rdo rje rigs kyi gtso bor gyur pas na rdo rje mchog go //
T02D2532:27a-3: yang dag mthar gyur pa ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2532:27a-4: de'i ngo bor gyur pas na yang dag mthar gyur ro //
T02D2532:27a-5: stong pa nyid kyi skye gnas las gang byung ba de ni stong pa nyid las byung ba'o //
T02D2532:27a-6: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste /
T02D2532:27a-7: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas byang chub bo //
T02D2532:27a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi yul la chags pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas chags pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-9: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa ni 'gro ba rnams 'don pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-10: de'i ngo bo nyid pas na sangs rgyas 'dod pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-11: sems can rnams kyi don mthar phyin pas sangs rgyas
T02D2532:27a-12: rnams kyi dgyes pa bskyed pas na sangs rgyas dgyes
T02D2532:27a-13: pa'o // sems can rnams theg pa chen po la
T02D2532:27a-14: rab tu 'jog pas dga' ba bskyed pas na sangs
T02D2532:27a-15: pa'o // rgyas rol pa'o // byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2532:27a-16: rnams lus ston pa'i rgyur 'dzum pa mdzad pas sangs
T02D2532:27a-17: pa'o // rgyas rol pa'o // rgyas 'dzum pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-18: khro bo'i gzugs la gnas nas gdug pa rnams skrag
T02D2532:27a-20: ha ha zhes bzhad par mdzad pas na sangs rgyas bzhad pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-21: sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni chos ston pa'i rnam pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-22: 'di yang de bzhin du gyur pas na sangs rgyas gsung ngo //
T02D2532:27a-23: sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid de /
T02D2532:27a-25: 'di la dngos po med pas na dngos po med pa'o //
T02D2532:27a-26: de lta na yang sems can gyi don du 'khor
T02D2532:27a-27: bar 'byung bar ston pas na med pa las byung
T02D2532:27a-28: ngo // 'di las sangs rgyas 'byung bas na sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o //
T02D2532:27a-29: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi de kho na
T02D2532:27a-30: nyid las nges par 'byung bas na nam mkha' las
T02D2532:27a-31: byung ba'o // gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid
T02D2532:27a-32: kyi ye shes las byung bas na ye shes las
T02D2532:27a-33: byung ba'o // byung ba'o // sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i spros pa ston pas na sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o //
T02D2532:27a-34: kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas kyi rol pas na sangs rgyas rol ston no //
T02D2532:27a-35: sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad pa'i yon tan
T02D2532:27a-36: gyi rang bzhin rnams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo
T02D2532:27a-37: zhes pa'o // de dag thams cad ye shes kyi sku'i mthu las de ltar so sor snang ste /
T02D2532:27a-39: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2532:27a-40: ces bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2532:27a-41: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i 'grel pa /
T02D2532:27b-0: slob dpon chen po 'jam dpal bshes @27b gnyen gyi zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2532:27b-2: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shraddha ka ra warma dang /
T02D2532:27b-3: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
